speakers.name: Ben Addison
speakers.title: What is Cybersecurity?
speakers.main: Former Security Analyst for FAANGs. Ben Addison will give an introduction to network protection and the most common security vulneralibilities.

speakers.name: Dawn Wright
speakers.title: Security 101
speakers.main: Senior Security Engineer and author of 'Usable Security'. Dawn Wright will give her insights on how to design and build secure systems with a human-centric focus that respect human performance.

speakers.name: Herald Daniel
speakers.title: Software Security
speakers.main: Senior Security Engineer and author of 'Cryptography - Hardness Assumptions'. Herald Daniel will talk about the foundations of software security and common attack patterns.

speakers.name: Jen Hubley
speakers.title: Offensive Computer Security
speakers.main: Entrepreneur and founder of 360 Security. Jen Hubley will talk about penetration testing and exploitation of systems to assess actual system security.
